Elden Ring Item Index

ID Name Description
000003E8Crimson Amber MedallionRaises maximum HP A medallion with crimson amber inlaid. Boosts maximum HP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
000003F2Cerulean Amber MedallionRaises maximum FP A medallion with cerulean amber inlaid. Boosts maximum FP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
000003FCViridian Amber MedallionRaises maximum stamina A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Boosts maximum stamina. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
00000410Erdtree's FavorRaises maximum HP and stamina A talisman depicting a special blessing of the Erdtree. Slightly raises maximum HP and stamina. It is said that when the Age of the Erdtree began, such blessings were personally bestowed upon their recipients by Queen Marika herself.
0000044CSilver ScarabRaises item discovery A talisman facsimile of a scarab, the carrier of treasures and precious things. This silver scarab enhances item discovery.
00000456Gold ScarabIncreases runes obtained from defeated enemies A talisman facsimile of a scarab, the carrier of treasures and precious things. This golden scarab increases the amount of runes obtained from defeating enemies.
0000047EGreen Turtle TalismanRaises stamina recovery speed A talisman in the shape of a green turtle. Raises stamina recovery speed. Turtles are known as a nutritious ingredient, symbolic of inexhaustible power. However, those who hold turtles to be wise creatures consider the practice of eating their meat to be barbarous.
00000488Stalwart Horn CharmRaises robustness An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises robustness. (Robustness governs resistance to blood loss and frost.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.
00000492Immunizing Horn CharmRaises immunity An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises immunity. (Immunity governs resistance to poison and rot.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.
0000049CClarifying Horn CharmRaises focus An accoutrement worn by the ancestral followers. Raises focus. (Focus governs resistance to sleep and madness.) Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.
000004A6Prince of Death's PustuleRaises vitality A fetid pustule taken from facial flesh. Raises vitality. (Vitality governs resistance to the effects of Death.) It is said that this pustule came from the visage of the Prince of Death, he who used to be called Godwyn. As First Dead of the demigods, it's said he's buried deep under the capital, at the Erdtree's roots.
000004B0Mottled NecklaceRaises robustness, immunity, and focus A vividly-colored accoutrement precious to the ancestral followers. Raises immunity, robustness, and focus. Said to be a budding horn. The ancestral followers believe that the horns of a long-lived beast continue to bud like antlers, over and over again, until the beast one day becomes an ancestral spirit.
000004BABull-Goat's TalismanRaises poise A talisman depicting the horns of a bull-goat. Raises poise. Bull-goats are associated with the stout and mighty Tragoth, said to be unflinching in combatâ€”now a silent comrade to those who fight.
000004CEWarrior Jar ShardBoosts the attack power of skills Shard of a shattered warrior jar. Boosts the attack power of skills. Scraps of stewed flesh cling to the shard, and tatters of ornaments can be seen mingled within the slime. Relics of ancient royal warriors, perhaps.
000004E2Millicent's ProsthesisBoosts dexterity, raises attack power with successive attacks Part of the golden prosthesis used by Millicent. The hand is locked into a fist that once raised a sword aloft. Boosts dexterity and raises attack power with successive attacks. The despair of sweet betrayal transformed Millicent from a mere bud into a magnificent flower. And one day, she will be rebornâ€”as a beautiful scarlet valkyrie.
000007D0Magic Scorpion CharmRaises magic attack, but lowers damage negation A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that shimmers with magic. Raises magic attack power, but lowers damage negation.
000007DALightning Scorpion CharmRaises lightning attack, but lowers damage negation A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that sparks with lightning. Raises lightning attack power, but lowers damage negation.
000007E4Fire Scorpion CharmRaises fire attack, but lowers damage negation A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart that burns with fire. Raises fire attack power, but lowers damage negation.
000007EESacred Scorpion CharmRaises holy attack, but lowers damage negation A talisman carried by assassins who strike unseen. Patterned on a scorpion freshly shed of its exoskeleton, its claws seizing a heart with a blessed glow. Raises holy attack power, but lowers damage negation.
000007F8Red-Feathered BranchswordRaises attack power when HP is low A talisman adorned with red feathers, once used in ancient death rituals. Raises attack power when HP is low. The heart sings when one draws close to death, and a glorious end awaits those who cling tenaciously to life.
00000802Ritual Sword TalismanRaises attack power when HP is at maximum A talisman patterned after swords used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree. Raises attack power when HP is at maximum. The practice had died out by the age of King Consort Radagon, but remains of the arenas where ritual combat took place can still be found in every land.
0000080CSpear TalismanEnhances counterattacks unique to thrusting weapons A talisman depicting a spear and a soldier. Enhances the counterattacks that are unique to thrusting weapons. Spears are standard weapons for soldiers in the Lands Between. They made it possible to respond to a ferocious foe with an equally ferocious counterattack.
00000816Hammer TalismanEnhances stamina-reducing attacks against blockers A talisman depicting a hammer and a knight. Enhances stamina-reducing attacks against a blocking opponent. Hammers are highly effective against shield-bearing foes, so much so that they are known as "knight-killers."
00000820Winged Sword InsigniaRaises attack power with successive attacks A talisman depicting a raised prosthetic blade. An honor bestowed upon the knights who fought alongside Malenia the Severed. Raises attack power with successive attacks. The wings symbolize Malenia and her undefeated prowess. Though she never knew relief from the accursed rot she was born into, her blade was forever beautifulâ€”and relentless.
0000082ADagger TalismanEnhances critical hits A talisman depicting a dagger and a surgeon. Enhances critical hits. The white-garbed field surgeons come to the aid of friend and foe alike by dealing a final deadly thrust to spare them from the prolonged agony of a mortal wound. A sense of mercy is a catalyst for bloodlust.
00000834Arrow's Reach TalismanIncreases bow effective range A talisman depicting three arrows. Carried by hunters of beasts. Increases the effective range of bows.
00000848Twinblade TalismanEnhances final hit of chain attacks A talisman depicting a twinblade and a confessor. Enhances the final hit ending a chain of attacks. The twinblade technique is a tradition of the confessors, who closely guard the secret of how they preserve the momentum of their attacks. Thus is the final strike of their onslaught all the more deadly.
00000852Axe TalismanEnhances charge attacks A talisman depicting an axe and a warrior. Enhances charge attacks. The Lord who led the Long March bore an axe, and his loyal warriors honored him by wielding axes of their own, making them very effective at dealing decisive blows.
00000866Arrow's Sting TalismanRaises attack power of arrows and bolts A talisman depicting three iron arrows. Carried by soldiers long ago. Raises attack power of arrows and bolts.
00000870Lord of Blood's ExultationBlood loss in vicinity increases attack power A talisman depicting the exultation of the Lord of Blood. Raises attack power when blood loss occurs in the vicinity. "Render up your offerings of blood to your Lord. Drench my consort's chamber. Slake his cocoon's thirst. His awakening shall herald the dawn of our dynasty."
0000087AKindred of Rot's ExultationPoisoning or rot in vicinity increases attack power A talisman depicting the exultation of pests. Raises attack power when poisoning or rot occurs in the vicinity. "Rot for the scarlet goddess. O scarlet blossoms, flourish in distant lands, and return to us, the unwanted children."
00000884Claw TalismanEnhances jump attacks A talisman depicting a claw and an assassin. Enhances jump attacks. The assassins of Ravenmount are killers by trade. They assail their victims while dressed as birds of prey.
0000088ERoar MedallionEnhances roars and breath attacks A bronze medallion depicting a roaring giant. Enhances roars and breath attacks. In ancient times, the giants were mortal enemies of the Erdtree. Their bellowing roars desolated nature, triggered avalanches, and whipped up storms of flame.
00000898Curved Sword TalismanEnhances guard counters A talisman depicting a curved sword and a swordsman. Enhances guard counters. It is said that a blind swordsman was the originator of this techniqueâ€”the art of allowing one's opponent to strike so as to leave them vulnerable to a well-timed reply.
000008A2Companion JarRaises potency of throwing pots A talisman given by the jars to their friends. Raises potency of thrown jars. Though the jars are brought to life by human flesh and blood, they are all rather kindly folk. Perhaps they were made to be better than their innards.
000008ACPerfumer's TalismanRaises potency of arts employing perfume A talisman depicting a set of perfume bottles. Raises potency of arts employing perfume. There are gardens known only to the perfumers. Whether hidden on the fringes of the highlands, or obscured by shadows inside caves, the flowers blossom in secret, waiting to impart their scent.
00000BB8Graven-School TalismanRaises potency of sorceries A talisman depicting a school of graven mages, the nightmare of the academy. Raises potency of sorceries. The primeval current is a forbidden tradition of glintstone sorcery. To those who cleave to its teachings, the act of collecting sorcerers to fashion them into the seeds of stars is but another path of scientific inquiry.
00000BE0Faithful's Canvas TalismanRaises potency of incantations A talisman bearing an icon that depicts a group of masked figures. Raises potency of incantations. The figures represent the flock at prayer, their firm belief in the intangible inspiring even the solitary founder of their religion. What is faith if not an affirmation?
00000BF4Old Lord's TalismanExtends spell effect duration A legendary talisman depicting the ancient king whose seat lies at the heart of the storm beyond time. Extends the duration of sorceries and incantations. It is said that the ancient royal city of Farum Azula has been slowly crumbling since time immemorial.
00000BFERadagon IconShortens spell casting time A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Radagon. Shortens the casting time of sorceries and incantations. As the husband of Rennala of Caria, the red-haired Radagon studied sorcery, and as the husband of Queen Marika, he studied incantations. Thus did the hero aspire to be complete.
00000C08Primal Glintstone BladeSpells consume less FP, but maximum HP is reduced An old glintstone blade that has been stained with blood. Reduces FP consumption of sorceries and incantations at the cost of maximum HP. The old sorcerers would slice open their hearts with these blades to imbue a primal glintstone with their soul, and thus did they die.
00000C12Godfrey IconEnhances charged spells and skills A legendary talisman depicting the Elden Lord Godfrey. Raises charge attack power of sorceries, incantations, and skills. Godfrey was a ferocious warrior. When he vowed to become a lord, he took the Beast Regent Serosh upon his back to suppress the ceaseless lust for battle that raged within.
00000FA0Dragoncrest Shield TalismanBoosts physical damage negation Wrought iron talisman depicting an ancient dragon. Boosts physical damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.
00000FAASpelldrake TalismanBoosts magical damage negation Talisman depicting a blue ancient dragon. Boosts magic damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.
00000FB4Flamedrake TalismanBoosts fire damage negation Talisman depicting a red ancient dragon. Boosts fire damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.
00000FBEBoltdrake TalismanBoosts lightning damage negation Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon. Boosts lightning damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.
00000FC8Haligdrake TalismanBoosts holy damage negation Talisman depicting a golden ancient dragon. Boosts holy damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.
00000FD2Pearldrake TalismanBoosts non-physical damage negation Talisman depicting a pearlescent ancient dragon. Boosts non-physical damage negation. The ancient dragons, who ruled in the prehistoric era before the Erdtree, would protect their lord as a wall of living rock. And so it is that the shape of the dragon has become symbolic of all manner of protections.
00000FE6Crucible Feather TalismanImproves dodge rolling but increases damage taken A talisman fashioned from feathers that embody the aspects of various creatures. Said to have grown on the human body long ago. Improves the effectiveness of dodge rolls, but increases damage taken at all times. A vestige of the crucible of primordial life. Born partially of devolution, it was considered a signifier of the divine in ancient times, but is now increasingly disdained as an impurity as civilization has advanced.
00000FF0Blue-Feathered BranchswordRaises damage negation when HP is low A talisman adorned with blue feathers, once used in ancient death rituals. Raises damage negation when HP is low. The heart sings when one draws close to death, and thus does one cling tenaciously to lifeâ€”to render up a death worth offering.
00000FFARitual Shield TalismanRaises damage negation when HP is at maximum A talisman patterned after shields used in ritual combat held to honor the Erdtree. Raises damage negation when HP is at maximum. The practice had died out by the age of King Consort Radagon, but remains of the arenas where ritual combat took place can still be found in every land.
00001004Greatshield TalismanBoosts guarding ability Talisman depicting a knight holding a greatshield. Boosts guarding ability. The knights of Leyndell once modelled themselves after the Tree Sentinels. Their purpose is to protect that which deserves protection, and thus the shield always comes before the sword.
00001388Crimson Seed TalismanBoosts HP restoration from Flask of Crimson Tears A crimson-colored talisman patterned after an Erdtree seed. Boosts HP restoration from the Flask of Crimson Tears. The Erdtree was once perfect and eternal, and thus was it believed that Erdtree seeds could not exist.
0000139CBlessed Dew TalismanSlowly restores HP Talisman depicting a drop of the Erdtree's sap, a blessed boon. Gradually restores HP. It was once thought that the blessed sap of the Erdtree would drip from its boughs foreverâ€”but that age of plenty swiftly came to a close, and with time, the Erdtree became more an object of faith.
000013A6Taker's CameoRestores HP upon defeating enemies A talisman engraved with a stern likeness of Praetor Rykard, master of Volcano Manor. Restores HP upon defeating enemies. When Rykard turned to heresy, taking by force became the rule. The gods themselves were no different, after all.
000013B0Godskin Swaddling ClothSuccessive attacks restore HP Sacred cloth of the Godskin Apostles, made from supple skin sewn together. Successive attacks restore HP. The Gloam-Eyed Queen cradles newborn apostles swaddled in this cloth. Soon they will grow to become the death of the gods.
000013BAAssassin's Crimson DaggerCritical hits restore HP An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in crimson. Critical hits restore HP. This charm is modelled after the darkly gleaming blades used in the Night of Black Knives. Those which gave the demigods their first taste of Death.
000013C4Assassin's Cerulean DaggerCritical hits restore FP An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in cerulean. Critical hits restore FP. This charm is modelled after the darkly gleaming blades used in the Night of Black Knives. Those which gave the demigods their first taste of Death.
00001784Carian Filigreed CrestLowers FP consumed by skills A talisman adorned with the royal crest. Lowers FP consumed by skills. An honor said to have once been awarded to Carian knights who served as direct retainers to the kingdom's princesses. Now there is only one princess: Ranni, daughter of Rennala.
000017B6Sacrificial TwigRunes are not lost upon death A talisman fashioned from a dried twig, so slender that it might snap at the slightest touch. Prevents rune loss upon death, and avoids levelling down, but the talisman itself will be lost in exchange. Believed to be a twig pruned from the Erdtree long, long ago.
000017DEAncestral Spirit's HornRestores FP upon defeating enemies Item cut from the horns of the Regal Ancestor Spirit. Restore FP upon defeating enemies. A number of new growths bud from the antler-like horns of the fallen king, each glowing with light. Thus does new life grow from death, and from death, one obtains power.
00001B58Symbol of AvariceGain more runes, but lose HP Head of the avaricious creature that mimics treasure chests. Increases runes obtained from defeated enemies as well as item discovery, but the curse of the branded also drains HP. This creature's very shape is thought to be the result of a form brandingâ€”a punishment for sin. Antique

0000001ELarge Scenic FlatstoneA Scenic Flatstone yet to be polished. Purchase to reveal its precious gift. This piece was chosen for its remarkable size.

000005F0Grand Drizzly Scene
000007D0Night of the BeastThe night belonging to Gladius, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The wolf pup, born with its three heads, was feared by its peers and driven out of the pack, but its will to live was strong indeed. Upon a rainswept night, it seized a man's sword with its great jaws, but he showed no fear. He did not seek to harm the wolf, but instead took it in his arms. It has remained at his side ever since, always carrying that very sword.
000007D1Dark Night of the BeastThe dark night belonging to Gladius, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The wolf pup, born with its three heads, was feared by its peers and driven out of the pack, but its will to live was strong indeed. Upon a rainswept night, it seized a man's sword with its great jaws, but he showed no fear. He did not seek to harm the wolf, but instead took it in his arms. It has remained at his side ever since, always carrying that very sword.
000007DANight of the BaronThe night belonging to Adel, left upon his defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The dragon was nothing less than a wonder of the natural world. Majestic in size and bearing, it was the apex predator of the old island upon which it roosted. But when the sky began to weep in hues of azure, all was lost. There was nothing left to feed upon, leaving only hunger, which grew into madness. A ravening unending.
000007DBDark Night of the BaronThe dark night belonging to Adel, left upon his defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The dragon was nothing less than a wonder of the natural world. Majestic in size and bearing, it was the apex predator of the old island upon which it roosted. But when the sky began to weep in hues of azure, all was lost. There was nothing left to feed upon, leaving only hunger, which grew into madness. A ravening unending.
000007E4Night of the WiseThe night belonging to Gnoster, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The secluded forest was being eaten away by the surrounding desert, and when the blessing of water passed over its many leaves and boughs, thus began a great exodus of its creatures. To survive, the insects would have to adapt. So began their prolonged and perilous journey.
000007E5Dark Night of the WiseThe dark night belonging to Gnoster, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The secluded forest was being eaten away by the surrounding desert, and when the blessing of water passed over its many leaves and boughs, thus began a great exodus of its creatures. To survive, the insects would have to adapt. So began their prolonged and perilous journey.
000007EENight of the FathomThe night belonging to Maris, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. For the first time in its existence, the drifting ancient being realized its interest had been piqued. Indeed, it had been roused from its aimless life of floating, camouflaged within its surroundings. The strange taste of this night was all too lonely, and more vast than it could ever know.
000007EFDark Night of the FathomThe dark night belonging to Maris, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. For the first time in its existence, the drifting ancient being realized its interest had been piqued. Indeed, it had been roused from its aimless life of floating, camouflaged within its surroundings. The strange taste of this night was all too lonely, and more vast than it could ever know.
000007F8Night of the DemonThe night belonging to Libra, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The demon was obsessed with the concepts of impartiality, fairness, and equanimity. For anything to reach a higher plane each side must elevate the other. The goat-eyed being gazed into the darkness. If it is true, that the night swallows all, then the night is impartial. The night is a thing of fairness, of equanimity. The night is a champion of balance.
000007F9Dark Night of the DemonThe dark night belonging to Libra, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The demon was obsessed with the concepts of impartiality, fairness, and equanimity. For anything to reach a higher plane each side must elevate the other. The goat-eyed being gazed into the darkness. If it is true, that the night swallows all, then the night is impartial. The night is a thing of fairness, of equanimity. The night is a champion of balance.
00000802Night of the ChampionThe night belonging to Fulghor, left upon his defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The left arm of the loyal and brave servant of the gods had been severed from behind. As he turned back to look, he fell to despair. It seemed his companions, who had walked with him upon the same perilous path, had now forsworn the very gods they once served.
00000803Dark Night of the ChampionThe dark night belonging to Fulghor, left upon his defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The left arm of the loyal and brave servant of the gods had been severed from behind. As he turned back to look, he fell to despair. It seemed his companions, who had walked with him upon the same perilous path, had now forsworn the very gods they once served.
0000080CNight of the MiasmaThe night belonging to Caligo, left upon her defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. From the phantasmal peak upon which she hid herself, she peered down into the world, committing to memory what she perceived. Then, her eye drawn to a certain cataclysm, from out of hiding she leapt with wings unfurled. For she wished to know and to understand, first hand, just what fortunes and misfortunes the disaster would bring upon the world.
0000080DDark Night of the MiasmaThe dark night belonging to Caligo, left upon her defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. From the phantasmal peak upon which she hid herself, she peered down into the world, committing to memory what she perceived. Then, her eye drawn to a certain cataclysm, from out of hiding she leapt with wings unfurled. For she wished to know and to understand, first hand, just what fortunes and misfortunes the disaster would bring upon the world.
00000834Night of the LordThe night belonging to Heolstor, left upon its defeat. The power of its namesake can be unlocked by performing a relic rite. The country lay in ruin. The man who once was knight had challenged the hero, but he too was no match. He fell, just another body in a great pile. But eventually he awoke, crawling out from underneath the others. Though he had failed to protect anything or anyone, he yet lived. And so he cursed the world. It was the dead of night, and from the sky poured down a great rain.
00002710Old PocketwatchA well-kept antique pocketwatch engraved with an intricate design, likely a prized possession. The influence of the encroaching Night clung to the expecting woman, preventing her from ever giving birth. The only means to break it meant the sacrifice of her life. But the curse of Night lived on, in both the orphan and in this keepsake, whose hands tell only twisted time. This dark power is both a badge of lost innocence, and the very thing that allows its owner to fight back.
00002711Besmirched FrameA small frame that is missing its picture. Whatever precious memory it once enshrined, now is home only to dust and grime. A voice is heard that beckons one to seek the owner. "Peer into this window, and revisit the first glimpse of night..."
00002712Fell Omen FetishA fetish bathed in golden magic. Shackles were used to bind the accursed people called the Omen, and these ones were made to keep a particular Omen under strictest confinement. But the magic has long faded, leaving only a dark stain in its wake. The protector of gold yet stands guard over the realm, even after being swallowed by Night.
00002AF8Slate WhetstoneA natural whetstone of high quality with a fine grain. A precious sharpening stone mined in Limveld. The clash with Night has spanned eons. And yet now, precious little time remains.
00002AF9The Wylder's EarringA single earring belonging to the Wylder. Rusted and encrusted with grime. Such ornaments were worn for generations by a distant tribe. They are delicately embellished to cast a pattern when held up to light. A relic of the Lord who lumbered ever onward, clutching tight this single ornament.
00002AFASilver TearA kernel of life that straddles the living and inanimate. Also known as a Larval Tear. Once, in the Lands Between, it was said to have granted one a new form.
00002AFBDelicate Burning Scene
00002AFCDelicate Burning Scene
00002EE0Third VolumeAnnals detailing the histories of certain cursed weapons speak of a conflict far to the west. An account mentions one such accursed weapon called an Ictarus. "The blades shared an identical engraving. A symbol of the sorcery of a distant land. A script put down in blood."
00002EE1Stone StakeA stone stake that opens a sealed-away lock. Crafted by an ancient civilization and claimed from a Guardian Golem. Still imbued with an old yet fading magic. Can open locks sealed in a similar manner to the golem.
00002EE2Witch's BroochA brooch imbued with potent magic, made from the blood magic crystal received from the Recluse. This brooch powered the accursed Ictarus weapons that once robbed the Pinionfolk of flight. At first, this magic brooch, with its aura of unknowable power, was intended as a ceremonial tool to calm violent winds. But the war, for better or worse, demanded that it be employed otherwise, as a magic artifact to bring a swift end to the conflict.
00002EE3Cracked Witch's BroochA cracked brooch, bereft of its former magic. A blood magic crystal received from the Recluse. This brooch powered the accursed Ictarus weapons that once robbed the Pinionfolk of flight. The Guardian smashed the jewel at the core of this magic implement. To think it was once a mere ceremonial tool to calm violent winds.
00002EE4Delicate Luminous Scene
00002EE5Delicate Drizzly Scene
00002EE6Delicate Drizzly Scene
00002EE7Delicate Tranquil Scene
000032C8Fine ArrowheadA finely-crafted streamlined arrowhead. Used by sellswords of the Fellowship. Said to be the choice weapon of the Monster, an inhuman assassin. A single word is written on each arrow, and when an arrow deals a death blow, the word becomes the epitaph of the fallen. To this day, the Monster lurks somewhere, unseen and unknown.
000032C9Cracked Sealing WaxSealing wax removed from an opened letter. Used by sellswords of the Fellowship. The stamp signifies an assassin's oath. Once a target is agreed upon, there is no going back. Such contracts are said to have their origin in the Lands Between.
000032CAEdge of OrderA fragment of the spear of Fulghor, Champion of Nightglow. Imbued with holy essence through battles in Limveld. Can briefly, and only with very limited potency, grant its power to other armaments. When Those Who Live in Death are felled by the Order, they will never rise again.
000036B0Golden DewLiquid plant extract that is highly effective at repairing armaments. Harvested in indeterminate locations across the Lands Between, but only by those who are aware of its useful properties. This viscous oil can be extracted by squeezing the flower, seeds and all. Some call the liquid golden dew, owing to its lustrous yellow hue.
000036B1Crown MedalA medal adorning a doll resembling a young girl. An extra decoration for the Revenant's garb. The silver shines with a brilliance that is both ceremonial and dignified. It recalls the girl's words. "With strength comes the burden of duty."
000036B2Blessed Iron CoinAn iron coin imbued with a small blessing by the priestess. Emits a faint warmth. The girl made a wish to the mechanical doll... That a blessing would reach himâ€”a blessing that could open the eyes of one who is already dead but refuses to accept it.
00003A98Torn Braided CordA torn magic-warding braided cord. Worn by warriors for good luck on the eve of battle. The distinctive stone clasp suggests that it belonged to glory-seeking pirates. The legends surrounding the competing seafaring factions, who divided the seas into east and west, have been spoken of for generations in places near and far.
00003A9ABlack Claw NecklaceA necklace made from a thick rugged claw, with a shining black luster that instils fear in any who gaze upon it. Long ago, the Raider fought the king of the archipelago forest. He grappled the hulking beast with his iron grip, and flung him away, proving his strength. He claimed the king's broken claw as a trophy and testament to his victory. For a time, the Raider devoted himself to exploits on the high seas, but he tired of the unending struggle that never seemed to determine a clear victor. And so, he delivered the claw to his arch nemesis as an invitation to duel to the death.
00003E80Blade of Night FragmentA blade fragment imbued with the power of Night. Crystals have formed on the broken edge. The dark substance slowly spread, as if to restore the lost portion of the blade, or to sharpen the existing blade beyond its natural properties.
00003E81Small Makeup BrushTool for accentuating the beauty of people and things. One of the Iron Menial's favorite items. Though plain it is a reliable tool, with a soft-bristled brush that delicately applies ceruse to skin or other surfaces. "Your beauty deserves nothing less."
00003E82Old PortraitAn intricate painting of a girl of pure heart and an elderly companion that conveys both trust and affection. On that night, the doll understoodâ€”the young girl wished to live. And with that understanding, the doll found her purpose. On the back of the painting is a hurriedly scrawled, fading message. "Chloe, seek happiness, for you deserve it more than anyone."
00004268Night ShardA crystallized form of the power of Night. A strange, translucent thing with a corrosive shadow that appears to writhe. The reach of the Night is limitless; its potential, immeasurable. Its touch indiscriminate, affecting any and all things. Whether one fears the Night, or welcomes it, depends upon the manner of contact. But as for the Night, here and now, it is the unquestioned enemy of the Condemned.
00004269Vestige of NightA clear sign of the Nightlord's presence, in the form of a terribly tattered rag. Burned and worn down over a span of time untold, the hint of an impression once made by the engraving of an old sealing stone can be seen, but it is no longer legible. The menial asked about an engraving. But how did he know there was one, before setting eyes upon it?
0000426ABone-Like StoneA disturbing stone with a distinct lifelessness. The bone of an outer god with the power to expunge divine essence, but that can also be destroyed by the same essence. The choice was left to the witch. As per the wishes of the one who bestowed it.
00004650Blessed FlowersAltus flowers flush with nutrients and grace. Before, such flowers were commonplace on the Altus Plateau. The vibrant hues suggest that the flowers received plenty of sunlight, and appear to shine in an ode to the resplendent Erdtree.
00004651Golden ShellA golden seed that has exhausted its grace. Such seeds were once found at the base of illusory trees. The seed was sapped of its grace by the priestess, but not entirely. Although very little remains, its grace will one day return, like trees that grow back in a celebration of life.
00004652Golden SproutA golden seed harboring a warm blessing. This one was found on a steep and snowy peak. This seed sprouted despite the harshness of its environment, like youthful potential blossoming in the crucible of adversity. Or, what may be called a miracle.
00004E20Delicate Burning SceneA relic that grants its favor upon departure on an expedition. Can be placed on the pedestal's red sand. The scenes within are the memories of warriors, that allow one to draw upon their minds for strength. A burning red scene recalls the pitched battles where the threads of life and death intertwined.

000F5ED9Polished Tranquil Scene
000F5EDAGrand Tranquil SceneArts -
0000000ANo SkillThis armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead. No skill. This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead.
00000064Lion's ClawSomersault forwards, striking foes with armament. Skill: Lion's Claw Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.
00000065Impaling ThrustBuild power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard. Skill: Impaling Thrust Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.
00000066Piercing FangStarting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked. Skill: Piercing Fang Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked.
00000067Spinning SlashSlash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. Skill: Spinning Slash Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
00000069Charge ForthQuickly charge forward, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance. Skill: Charge Forth Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance.
0000006AStamp (Upward Cut)Brace armament and step into a low stance that briefly boosts poise. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike. Skill: Stamp (Upward Cut) Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.
0000006BStamp (Sweep)Brace armament and step into a low stance that briefly boosts poise. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike. Skill: Stamp (Sweep) Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.
0000006CBlood TaxUnleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP. Skill: Blood Tax Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.
0000006DRepeating ThrustUnleash a flurry of thrusts. Skill: Repeating Thrust Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts.
0000006EWild StrikesSwing armament with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Skill: Wild Strikes Swing armament with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.
0000006FSpinning StrikesPerform continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Skill: Spinning Strikes Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.
00000070Double SlashPerform a crossing slash attack. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks. Skill: Double Slash Skill of superior swordsmen. Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
00000071Prelate's ChargeSlam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge. Skill: Prelate's Charge Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge.
00000072UnsheatheSheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack. Skill: Unsheathe Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.
00000073Square OffThis skill starts with the sword held level. Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust. Skill: Square Off This skill starts with the sword held level. Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.
00000074Giant HuntStep forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust. Skill: Giant Hunt Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes. Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.
00000075Torch AttackThrust torch forward to set foes ablaze. Skill: Torch Attack Thrust torch forward to set foes ablaze. This skill is especially effective against foes who are weak to fire.
00000076Loretta's SlashLeap forward, imbuing the blade with magic, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash. Skill: Loretta's Slash Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.
00000077Poison Moth FlightSlash with a poison-infused blade. If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, deal significant damage. Skill: Poison Moth Flight Slash with a poison-infused blade. If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.
00000078Spinning WeaponLifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Skill: Spinning Weapon Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses. Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.
0000007AStorm AssaultLeap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact. Skill: Storm Assault One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.
0000007BStormcallerSpin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks. Skill: Stormcaller One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
0000007CSword DanceQuickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash. Skill: Sword Dance Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.
0000007DSpinning ChainSpins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successive attack. Skill: Spinning Chain Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successive attack.
000000C8Glintblade PhalanxForm an arch of magic glintblades overhead, which will attack foes automatically. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust. Skill: Glintblade Phalanx Skill used by the enchanted knights who served the Carian royal family. Form an arch of magic glintblades overhead, which will attack foes automatically. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.
000000C9Sacred BladeGrants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for a while. Skill: Sacred Blade Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for a while.
000000CAIce SpearSpin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice. Skill: Ice Spear Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni. Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.
000000CBGlintstone PebbleEmploys the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust. Skill: Glintstone Pebble Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.
000000CCBloody SlashCoat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc. Skill: Bloody Slash Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.
000000CDLifesteal FistA punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build. Skill: Lifesteal Fist Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies. A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.
000000CFEruptionSlam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release. Skill: Eruption Skill of the knights who serve at Volcano Manor. Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release.
000000D0Prayerful StrikeRaise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to self and nearby allies if it successfully hits. Skill: Prayerful Strike Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.
000000D1GravitasThrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well and pull enemies in. Skill: Gravitas Skill originating from the Alabaster Lords, who had skin of stone. Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.
000000D2Storm BladeSurround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession. Skill: Storm Blade Lost skill of Stormveil. Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession.
000000D4EarthshakerThrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike. Skill: Earthshaker Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
000000D5Golden LandThrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike. Skill: Golden Land Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
000000D6Flaming StrikeEmits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to coat the armament in fire and perform a lunging, sweeping strike. Skill: Flaming Strike Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.
000000D8ThunderboltRaise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession. Skill: Thunderbolt Skill used by the capital's ancient dragon cult. Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession.
000000D9Lightning SlashCall down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while. Skill: Lightning Slash Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.
000000DACarian GrandeurTransform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels. Skill: Carian Grandeur Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.
000000DBCarian GreatswordTransform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power. Skill: Carian Greatsword Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power.
000000DCVacuum SliceHold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile. Skill: Vacuum Slice Lost skill of ancient heroes. Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.
000000DDBlack Flame TornadoSpin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament. Skill: Black Flame Tornado Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.
000000DESacred Ring of LightGather a sacred ring of light in the armament, then fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession. Skill: Sacred Ring of Light Skill used by the commanders of the Cleanrot Knights. Gather a sacred ring of light in the armament, then fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession.
000000DFFirebreatherBlow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time. Skill: Firebreather Blow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.
000000E0Blood BladeWound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession. Skill: Blood Blade Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.
000000E1Phantom SlashCreate an apparition who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. Skill: Phantom Slash Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
000000E2Spectral LanceHurl a phantasmic spear at foes. Skill: Spectral Lance Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights. Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.
000000E3Chilling MistCoat armament in frost and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while. Skill: Chilling Mist Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while.
000000E4Poisonous MistBathe armament in poison and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards. The armament retains its poison for a while. Skill: Poisonous Mist Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards. The armament retains its poison for a while.
0000012CShield BashBrace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Skill: Shield Bash Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.
0000012DBarricade ShieldFocus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows. Skill: Barricade Shield Skill made famous by Sir Neidhardt. Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.
0000012EParryDeflect an attack and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit. Skill: Parry Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.
0000012FBuckler ParryDeflect an attack and break that foe's stance. Activates faster than a regular parry. Skill: Buckler Parry Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This is faster than a regular parry.
00000131Carian RetaliationDispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry. Skill: Carian Retaliation Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
00000132Storm WallCreate a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry. Skill: Storm Wall Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
00000133Golden ParryDeflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance. Skill: Golden Parry Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance.
00000134Shield CrashTwo-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards. Skill: Shield Crash Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.
00000135Thops's BarrierDeflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry. Skill: Thops's Barrier Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
00000190Through and ThroughHold a greatbow in an oblique stance, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies. Skill: Through and Through Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance. Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.
00000191BarrageHold a bow horizontally, then fire off a rapid succession of shots. Skill: Barrage Archery skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.
00000192Mighty ShotReady the bow in an oblique stance, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard. Skill: Mighty Shot Archery skill performed from an oblique stance. Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.
00000194Enchanted ShotEnlivens the arrow with spiritual essence. The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target. Skill: Enchanted Shot Archery skill that enlivens the arrow with spiritual essence. The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.
00000195Sky ShotReady the bow from a low stance, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from above when it comes down. Skill: Sky Shot Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from above when it comes down.
00000196Rain of ArrowsReady the bow from a low stance, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles. Skill: Rain of Arrows Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles.
000001F5Hoarfrost StompStomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect. Skill: Hoarfrost Stomp Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect.
000001F6Storm StompStomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm. Skill: Storm Stomp One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.
000001F7KickPush an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Skill: Kick Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.
000001F8Lightning RamLet out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession. Skill: Lightning Ram Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.
000001F9Flame of the RedmanesProduce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc. Skill: Flame of the Redmanes Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.
000001FAGround SlamJump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions. Skill: Ground Slam Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.
000001FBGolden SlamJump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions. Skill: Golden Slam Skill of the avatars who protect Minor Erdtrees. Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.
000001FCWaves of DarknessPlunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike. Skill: Waves of Darkness Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
000001FDHoarah Loux's EarthshakerSlam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again. Skill: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.
00000258DeterminationPledge your resolve, powering up your next attack. Skill: Determination A knightly skill. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.
00000259Royal Knight's ResolvePledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack. Skill: Royal Knight's Resolve Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.
0000025AAssassin's GambitMasks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps. Skill: Assassin's Gambit Skill that masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps.
0000025BGolden VowGrants self and nearby allies increased attack power and damage negation. Skill: Golden Vow Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and damage negation.
0000025CSacred OrderPerform a salute and grant the armament holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death. Skill: Sacred Order Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.
0000025DShared OrderGrant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death. Skill: Shared Order Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.
0000025ESeppukuPlunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss. Skill: Seppuku A forbidden technique used by swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.
0000025FCragbladeBury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance. Skill: Cragblade Skill that manipulates gravity. Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance.
0000028ABarbaric RoarLet loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks. Unique Skill: Ordovis's Vortex Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground. This skill can be charged to increase its power.
000004AFSpinning WeaponSuspends the scepter in mid-air and cause it to spin violently. Unique Skill: Spinning Weapon Channel magic into the glintstone to suspend the scepter in mid air and cause it to spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive magic attacks. AttachEffect

008117A8Flame of Frenzy While WalkingCauses the yellow flame of frenzy to violently burst forth while walking
0081180CWraiths While WalkingUnleashes wraiths that chase down foes while walking
00811870Vicious Star Rain Pours While WalkingSummons a dark cloud of stars overhead while walking. The cloud will release a violent deluge of star rain.
008118D4Storm of Red Lightning While WalkingWalking calls red lightning which strikes the vicinity

00836260Fire Attack Follows Charge AttacksCharge attacks trigger a fire attack

008387E0Taking Damage Restores FPRestores FP upon receiving damage

0083B01CDefeating Group Releases Mist of CharmDefeating multiple enemies produces a mist that charms enemies
0083B080Defeating Group Calls Vengeful SpiritsDefeating multiple enemies summons vengeful spirits that chase down foes

0083B148Defeating Group Releases Mist of FrostDefeating multiple enemies produces a mist of frost
0083B1ACDefeating Group Unleashes LightningDefeating multiple enemies strike a bolt of lightning
0083B210Defeating Group Fires Golden ShockwaveDefeating multiple enemies produces a golden shockwave
0083D600Critical Hit HP RestorationCritical hits restore HP
0083D664Critical Hit FP RestorationCritical hits restore FP
0083D6C8Damage Boosted after Critical HitCritical hits increase damage inflicted upon enemies
0083D72CSacred Order upon Holy Critical HitCritical hits with holy affinity create an image of Order
0083D790Magma upon Fire Critical HitCritical hits with fire affinity spawn roiling lava

0083D8BCPoison Mist upon Poison Critical HitCritical hits with poison release poison mist
0083D920Blood Loss Crit: Thorns of PunishmentCritical hits with blood loss summon thorns of blood

0083D9E8Ice Storm upon Critical Hit with FrostCritical hits with frost cause an ice storm
0083DA4CMadness Crit. Hit Fires Frenzied FlameCritical hits with madness launch a flame of frenzy

0088B864Changed Strong AttacksStrong attacks change to a different attack

0089CD58Power of the Greater WillCharge attacks produce waves of light

0089D014Power of the Golden OrderCharge attacks heal all ailments and dispel all temporary effects
0089F148Power of Destined DeathAttacking also wears down enemy HP for a moment afterwards
0089F274Power of the StarscourgeThe first blow of consecutive attacks creates a gravitational wave that pulls in enemies when wielding two swords
0089F3A0Power of DestructionCharge attacks cause a wave of gravitational force
0089F468Power of VengeanceEnhances all attributes upon defeating enemies. This effect accumulates.
008A4030Power of the DragonlordStrong jump attacks transform the wielder into a thundercloud that plunges down with a lightning-infused blade
008A6998Power of DespairAttacked enemies become likely to die regardless of remaining HP

008AB498Power of the UndefeatedAttacks after receiving damage partially recover HP

00986FD4The Wylder's GriefThe Wylder's grief enhances strength and dexterity
00987038The Guardian's GriefThe Guardian's grief enhances maximum HP and stamina
0098709CThe Ironeye's GriefThe Ironeye's grief enhances maximum stamina and dexterity
00987100The Duchess' GriefThe Duchess' grief enhances dexterity and intelligence
00987164The Raider's GriefThe Raider's grief enhances maximum HP and strength
009871C8The Revenant's GriefThe Revenant's grief enhances faith and arcane
0098722CThe Recluse's GriefThe Recluse's grief enhances maximum FP and intelligence
00987290The Executor's GriefThe Executor's grief enhances dexterity and arcane Goods
00000064Tarnished's Furled FingerCreates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Creates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer. Arrive as a cooperator (Furled Finger) with the objective of defeating the area boss of the world to which you were summoned. A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook. It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.
00000065Duelist's Furled FingerCreates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Creates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer. Arrive as an adversary (Duelist) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned. A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook. The bronze adornments are the mark of a duelist.
00000066Bloody FingerAttempts invasion of other player's world Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Attempts an invasion of another player's world. If successful, you will arrive as an invader (Bloody Finger) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of that world. Glistening blood has been siphoned into the nail of this finger. Its sickly pale skin feels nothing now, but the nail still aches with sweetest pain.
00000067Finger SevererSends another, or oneself, home Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Use as a Host of Fingers to select a summoned player and send them back to their world. Use when you have been summoned to another player's world to return to your own world. This phantom blade severs the link formed by a Furled Finger, but the maidens scorn those who abuse its use.
00000068White Cipher RingWhen invaded, requests the aid of a hunter Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Allows you to automatically request for a hunter from another world to come to your rescue when your world is invaded. (Summoning is not always possible.) One of the lost mystic codes said to have been bestowed by the Two Fingers.
00000069Blue Cipher RingAnswers requests for summoning from hunters Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Puts the wearer in ready state to answer should someone in another world call for rescue. You will be summoned to their world as a hunter. During hunter multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the invader of the summoned world.
0000006ATarnished's Wizened FingerUsed to write messages to other worlds Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Messages menu.) Use to write messages. Your messages will be conveyed to other worlds, allowing other players to read them. A finger of corpse wax, so emaciated the bone is visible. It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.
0000006BPhantom Bloody FingerAttempts repeat invasion of last targeted world Item for online play. Obtained after invading another world. Consumed upon use. Attempts another invasion of the most recently invaded world. This may come in handy should separation from the Host of Fingers force a temporary retreat.
0000006CTaunter's TongueLures in invaders Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Lures in invaders. This allows your world to be invaded without any Furled Finger cooperators present, and it also shortens the interval between windows of opportunity for invasion. Additionally, enables the arrival of a second invader to join when a cooperator is present. (With two invaders, the maximum number of cooperators becomes one.)
0000006DSmall Golden EffigySends a co-op sign to summoning pools Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Send a cooperative summon sign to several nearby summoning pools (activated pools only). In cooperative multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the area boss of the world to which you were summoned.
0000006ESmall Red EffigySends a hostile sign to summoning pools Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Send a competitive summon sign to several nearby summoning pools (activated pools only). In competitive multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned.
0000006FFestering Bloody FingerAttempts invasion of other player's world Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Consumed upon use. Attempts an invasion of another player's world. If successful, you will arrive as an invader (Bloody Finger) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of that world. This furled finger is blackened with blood congestion. It seems to have been chopped off rather unceremoniously.
00000070Recusant FingerAttempts invasion of other player's world Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Attempts an invasion of another player's world. If successful, you will arrive as an invader (Recusant) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of that world. This furled finger is covered in snake scales. An heirloom of the lord of the Volcano Manor, bequeathed to Tarnished who have become family.
00000071Phantom Bloody FingerAttempts repeat invasion of last targeted world Item for online play. Obtained after invading another world. Consumed upon use. Attempts another invasion of the most recently invaded world. This may come in handy should separation from the Host of Fingers force a temporary retreat.
00000072Phantom Recusant FingerAttempts repeat invasion of last targeted world Item for online play. Obtained after invading another world. Consumed upon use. Attempts another invasion of the most recently invaded world. This may come in handy should separation from the Host of Fingers force a temporary retreat.
00000073Memory of GraceLose all runes, return to last site of lost grace visited The memory of first grace, which once guided bygone Tarnished to the Lands Between. Lose all runes and return to last site of grace visited. It is merely a cycle. Stand before the Elden Ring. Become the Elden Lord.
00000082Spectral Steed WhistleSummon and ride Torrent, the spectral steed A delicate goldwork ring. Can be used as a finger whistle. Sound the whistle to summon and ride Torrent, the spectral steed. (Dismounts steed when used while on horseback.) Upon his death, the spectral steed can be summoned again, but doing so drains the Flask of Crimson Tears.
00000087Phantom Great RuneGive blessing of blood to enemies in invaded world Item for online play. Obtained after using the Mohg's Great Rune and invading another world. Consumed upon use. Enemies inside the invaded world receive a blessing of blood, which boosts their attack power when blood loss occurs nearby. Also, your HP recovers when blessed enemies defeat a player.
00000096Furlcalling Finger RemedyReveals co-op and hostile summoning signs Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Craftable item. Reveals cooperative and competitive multiplayer signs. Co-op summoning signs will be shown in gold, while hostile summoning signs will be shown in red. Multiplayer begins when you summon a player from another world through their sign.
000000AATarnished's Furled FingerCreates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Creates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer. Arrive as a cooperator (Furled Finger) with the objective of defeating the area boss of the world to which you were summoned. A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook. It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.
000000ABDuelist's Furled FingerCreates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.) Creates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer. Arrive as an adversary (Duelist) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned. A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook. The bronze adornments are the mark of a duelist.
